|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **DEFINITION:** | |
| **TRADEMARK PRODUCT** | All printed pouches and labelled pouches that displays Brands, Nutritional Information etc. of 3rd Party |
| **WORK INSTRUCTION** | Waste must be weighed after production in a separate tubing with the **work order** and **weight** clearly visible before destruction can take place. Responsible person must initial and date |
| Waste must be weighed after destruction in a separate tubing with the **work order** and **weight** clearly visible before disposal can take place. Responsible person must initial and date |
| **DESTRUCTION METHOD:** | All pouches shall be **rendered unusable** by using a knife/guillotine to slice through the pouch. |

| Monday, 17 September 2018 | Reviewed and updated (BRC Audit Non-Conformity) | 2 | SD REC |
